title: The Dinosaur Encounter: The Alberta Episode
description: After a freak accident which leaves Tori blind, she acquires a unique ability that allows her to sense the thoughts and feelings of inanimate objects, and enables her to travel to new and unexplored places. Join Tori as she and her siblings embark on the first journey in the Blue Crescent Moon series, and visit the fantastical past of dinosaurs in the beautiful province of Alberta. Together, they pool their knowledge and talents to devise a plan for a special rescue mission which will put them in danger and threaten their lives. Will they survive the experience?
author: Lisa Tasca Oatway
